# Introduction

The IOTA sandbox is a service that let's developers quickly get off the ground with IOTA and interact with the network without having to run their own node.

# Authentication

Not yet implemented

# Commands

All endpoints, except `/commands/attachToTangle`, mirror IRI behaviour, i.e. they expect the
same json and will return the same answer unless there's an error caused by the
webserver itself.

Please refer to the [IOTA Readme](https://iota.readme.io/docs) for the
indepth description of the commands and their objects.

## getNodeInfo

[getNodeInfo](https://iota.readme.io/docs/getnodeinfo)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getNodeInfo`


## getTips

[getTips](https://iota.readme.io/docs/gettips)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getTips`

## findTransactions

[findTransactions](https://iota.readme.io/docs/findtransactions)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/findTransactions`

## getTrytes

[getTrytes](https://iota.readme.io/docs/gettrytes)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getTrytes`

## getInclusionStates

[getInclusionStates](https://iota.readme.io/docs/getinclusionstates)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getInclusionStates`

## getBalances

[getBalances](https://iota.readme.io/docs/getbalances)


### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getBalances`

## getTransactionsToApprove

[getTransactionsToApprove](https://iota.readme.io/docs/gettransactionstoapprove)

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/getTransactionsToApprove`

## attachToTangle

The [attachToTangle](https://iota.readme.io/docs/attachtotangle) endpoints expects,
just like the others, the same object to be posted to it but instead of returning the
trytes directly it returns a job that will be handled asynchronously.
The status of the job can then be queried via the `/jobs/:id` endpoint.

The `Link` HTTP header contains the path of the newly created job.

```shell
curl -X POST \
     -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
     -d '{"command": "attachToTangle", "trunkTransaction": "JVMTDGDPDFYHMZPMWEKKANBQSLSDTIIHAYQUMZOKHXXXGJHJDQPOMDOMNRDKYCZRUFZROZDADTHZC9999", "branchTransaction": "P9KFSJVGSPLXAEBJSHWFZLGP9GGJTIO9YITDEHATDTGAFLPLBZ9FOFWWTKMAZXZHFGQHUOXLXUALY9999", "minWeightMagnitude": 13, "trytes": [""]}' \
     "https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/attachToTangle"
```

> The above command returns JSON structured like this:

```json
{
  "id":"70fef55d-6933-49fb-ae17-ec5d02bc9117",
  "status":"QUEUED",
  "createdAt":1483574581,
  "startedAt":null,
  "finishedAt":null,
  "command":"attachToTangle",
  "attachToTangleRequest": {
    "command":"attachToTangle",
    "trunkTransaction":"JVMTDGDPDFYHMZPMWEKKANBQSLSDTIIHAYQUMZOKHXXXGJHJDQPOMDOMNRDKYCZRUFZROZDADTHZC9999",
    "branchTransaction":"P9KFSJVGSPLXAEBJSHWFZLGP9GGJTIO9YITDEHATDTGAFLPLBZ9FOFWWTKMAZXZHFGQHUOXLXUALY9999",
    "minWeightMagnitude":13,
    "trytes": [
      ""
    ]
  }
}
```

### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/attachToTangle`

## broadcastTransactions

[broadcastTransactions](https://iota.readme.io/docs/broadcasttransactions)


### HTTP Request

`POST https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/commands/broadcastTransactions`

# Jobs

Job Status | Description |
---------- | -------------
QUEUED | job is waiting to be executed |
RUNNING | **currently not in use** |
FAILED | job failed during execution |
ABORTED | **currently not in use** |
FINISHED | job finished successfully |

## Get A Job

```shell
curl "https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/jobs/70fef55d-6933-49fb-ae17-ec5d02bc9117"
```

> The above command returns JSON structured like this:

```json
{
  "id":"70fef55d-6933-49fb-ae17-ec5d02bc9117",
  "status":"QUEUED",
  "createdAt":1483574581,
  "startedAt":null,
  "finishedAt":null,
  "command":"attachToTangle",
  "attachToTangleRequest": {
    "command":"attachToTangle",
    "trunkTransaction":"JVMTDGDPDFYHMZPMWEKKANBQSLSDTIIHAYQUMZOKHXXXGJHJDQPOMDOMNRDKYCZRUFZROZDADTHZC9999",
    "branchTransaction":"P9KFSJVGSPLXAEBJSHWFZLGP9GGJTIO9YITDEHATDTGAFLPLBZ9FOFWWTKMAZXZHFGQHUOXLXUALY9999",
    "minWeightMagnitude":13,
    "trytes": [
      ""
    ]
  }
}
```

> Failure response:

```json
{
  "id":"70fef55d-6933-49fb-ae17-ec5d02bc9117",
  "status":"FAILED",
  "createdAt":1483574581,
  "startedAt":1483574781,
  "finishedAt":1483574781,
  "command":"attachToTangle",
  "attachToTangleRequest": {
    "command":"attachToTangle",
    "trunkTransaction":"JVMTDGDPDFYHMZPMWEKKANBQSLSDTIIHAYQUMZOKHXXXGJHJDQPOMDOMNRDKYCZRUFZROZDADTHZC9999",
    "branchTransaction":"P9KFSJVGSPLXAEBJSHWFZLGP9GGJTIO9YITDEHATDTGAFLPLBZ9FOFWWTKMAZXZHFGQHUOXLXUALY9999",
    "minWeightMagnitude":13,
    "trytes": []
  },
  "error": {"message": "no trytes supplied"}
}
```

This endpoint retrieves the job with the given ID.

### HTTP Request

`GET https://sandbox.iotatoken.com/api/v1/jobs/:id`

### URL Parameters

Parameter | Description
--------- | -----------
id | The ID of the job to retrieve
